subtitle: About Me!
content: I'm a Software Engineer, I finished my career on Engineering at the Cluj-Napoca Technical University. During my career I picked up a variety of technologies, related to both frontend and backend. I am constantly interested in learning more and staying up to date with the latest technologies and trends. Always keeping an eye on open source. I think one of my values is the ability to resolve complex tasks, having the business side of things in mind and trying to solve real-world problems.
